product_name: Trails Illustrated Nantahala and Cullasaja Gorges Trail Map
long_description: This National Geographic Trails Illustrated folded map offers comprehensive coverage of the Nantahala and Cullasaja Gorges area of North Carolina. Provides valuable wilderness tips and Leave No Trace guidelines, along with updated trails, trailheads, points of interest, campgrounds and much more. Printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers the durability needed for outdoor use. Includes selected waypoints in both lat./lon. and UTM coordinate systems as well as GPS-compatible UTM grid lines for easy navigation. Measures 9.25 x 4.25 in. folded and 37.75 x 25.5 in. fully opened; scale of 1:70,000. National Geographic Maps; copyright 2002.
short_description: This National Geographic Trails Illustrated folded map offers comprehensive coverage of the Nantahala and Cullasaja Gorges area of North Carolina.
